archimate:BusinessObject.name: Law on e-invoicing
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
Law of 7 April 2019 amending the Law of 17 June 2016 on public contracts, the Law of 17 June 2016 on concessions, the Law of 13 August 2011 on public contracts and certain works, supply and service contracts in the fields of defence and security and amending the Law of 4 May 2016 on the re-use of public sector information (e-invoicing).
http://www.ejustice.just.fgov.be/mopdf/2019/04/16_1.pdf#Page11
